title: President Rajapaksa arrives Bhutan to attend 16th SAARC Summit
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Sudath Silva President Mahinda Rajapaksa arrived at the Paro International Airport in Bhutan this morning on 26th April to attend the 16th SAARC Summit which will be held in Thimpu on 28 and 29th of this month. He was warmly received by the Prime Minister of…
